longBusinessSummary: DLF Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the business of colonization and real estate development in India. Its real estate development activities include identification and acquisition of land, and planning, execution, construction, and marketing of projects. The company develops and sells residential housing projects; and operates and maintains commercial office spaces, as well as retail properties, such as malls and hospitality projects. It owns and operates The Lodhi Hotel located in New Delhi and owns the Hilton Garden Inn located in New Delhi; and owns and operates a golf club under DLF Golf & Country Club located in Gurugram. In addition, the company engages in leasing, maintenance, power generation, and recreational activities. DLF Limited was founded in 1946 and is based in Gurugram, India. DLF Limited operates as a subsidiary of Rajdhani Investments and Agencies Private Limited.
